entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
